sense.gloss: state (of the US, Australia, India, Germany, etc.), province (e.g. of Canada), county (e.g. of the UK), region (e.g. of Italy), canton, oblast
the five continents, Asia, Africa, Europe, America and Australia, Asia, Africa, Europe, North America and South America

sdata.j: ↑５月↑↓ごがつ↓１０↑日↑↓にち↓↑月曜日↑↓げつようび↓の↑午後↑↓ごご↓３↑時↑↓じ↓に↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓↑駅↑↓えき↓↑八重洲↑↓やえす↓↑中央↑↓ちゅうおう↓↑口↑↓くち↓で↑待↑↓ま↓ち↑合↑↓あ↓わせをしていただけませんか。
sdata.e: Would you please meet me at Yaesu central gate of Tokyo Station on Monday, May 10th at 3:00 p.m.?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓をとりたいときは↑八重洲↑↓やえす↓ホテルにいますから。
sdata.e: You can get hold of me at the Yasesu Hotel.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑八重洲↑↓やえす↓ホテルに↑一室↑↓いっしつ↓をとった。
sdata.e: He took a room at the Yaesu Hotel.
